definition: Yi Jianlian (1987-), Chinese basketball player for the New Jersey Nets (NBA)
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Yao said that Yi is able to do things athletically that is unmatched in Chinese basketball.
sentences.chinese: 姚明说易建联在中国国内赛场上已经找不到对手。

sentences.english: Yi could also prove a nice recruiting tool.
sentences.chinese: 易建联还将证明他是个招财进宝的好手。

sentences.english: Yi forces Nowitzki into a turnover on a fast break.
sentences.chinese: 诺维斯基突破后，易建联把他逼出一个失误。

sentences.english: Stefanski even questioned Yi's listed height.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至怀疑易建联的注册身高。

sentences.english: Like Mr. Yao, Mr. Yi (pronounced Eee) knows that his fans in China want winners.
sentences.chinese: 跟姚明一样，易建联也知道他的中国球迷想要胜利者。

sentences.english: Yi Jianlian, Wang Zhizhi got 22 and 19 points respectively.
sentences.chinese: 场上，易建联得22分，王治郅获19分。

sentences.english: This article is written by a femal Yi fan.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章出自易建联的女球迷之手。

sentences.english: And Chinese sensation Yi Jianlian played the role of a treasured Christmas gift in the New Jersey lineup.
sentences.chinese: 中国球员易建联成为网队珍贵的圣诞礼物。

sentences.english: Yi's got more upside as a scorer, and probably projects better as a shot-blocker, too.
sentences.chinese: 作为投手，易建联更喜欢外线投篮，封盖也更好。

sentences.english: Yi Jianlian is the most awkward person in Madison Square Garden right now.
sentences.chinese: 易建联，现在是麦迪逊广场花园队最尴尬的人了。

sentences.english: At fan easy to build the couplet , the couplet's heart forever unique.
sentences.chinese: 易建联，联迷心中永远地独一。

definition: Wang Zhizhi (1977-), former Chinese basketball player
Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
